items.sentence: Tom couldn't believe Mary didn't want to go to the dance with him.
After three days, any fish stinks, no matter how good it once was.
Tom is a nice guy in spite of the fact that he has a lot of money.
Isn't it a pity that Tom and Mary can't get along with each other?
If Tom had had enough money, he would've gone to Boston with Mary.
Correct me if Iâ€™m wrong, but didn't you say you'd never done that?
Tom was stranded when his car conked out in the middle of nowhere.
A sharp pain shot through Tom's body and he slumped to the ground.
One of Tom's teachers told him that he'd never amount to anything.
It suddenly dawned on Tom that he'd been doing it wrong all along.
